body_html: Could you pass -s to bazel build so we can see what the flags are that are being passed to g++ when this error is raised? I just tried compiling a little bit at HEAD and it seems to be passing -O2 when I say --config=opt.
body_text: Could you pass -s to bazel build so we can see what the flags are that are being passed to g++ when this error is raised? I just tried compiling a little bit at HEAD and it seems to be passing -O2 when I say --config=opt.
body: Could you pass `-s` to bazel build so we can see what the flags are that are being passed to g++ when this error is raised? I just tried compiling a little bit at HEAD and it seems to be passing `-O2` when I say `--config=opt`.
